attributes.action: Give the British Nationals (Overseas) of Hong Kong full British citizenship.
attributes.additional_details: The situation in Hong Kong will only continue to get worse and therefore the UK government should step up and give holders of British Nationals (Overseas) status in Hong Kong British citizenship. Lord Goldsmith has said it is legal to give these people of Hong Kong British citizenship.
attributes.background: People in Hong Kong are in a bad situation with their rights deteriorating and therefore the government should step up and grant people in Hong Kong British citizenship.
